title: Shelf-life of cooked meat of southern king crab (Lithodes santolla) and false king crab (Paralomis granulosa) during refrigerated storage
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Laura L. Cocito, Sabrina Permigiani, Federico Tapella, M. Eugenia Lattuca, Alejandra Tomac, Marina Czerner, M. Carolina Romero
